content: The Scorpion Prince attacks with one giant claw, and his large poisonous stinger on his back, and each can be painful in their own right. He'll often charge at you with his claw and drag it through the floor to fling it upwards, or pounce at you from range, while following up with a tail swipe and second claw attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Upper_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Upper Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Pool of Shattered Jade'.
The content is as follows:
The Scorpion Prince attacks with one giant claw, and his large poisonous stinger on his back, and each can be painful in their own right. He'll often charge at you with his claw and drag it through the floor to fling it upwards, or pounce at you from range, while following up with a tail swipe and second claw attack.
